attributes.action: young driver (17-24 year olds) insurance should be reviewed, it is not fair!
attributes.background: most young drivers want to drive. not only for freedom but for work and also education.  we  are the lowest earning group but pay the most, a lot of young drivers after a year of driving are just as compentent on the road as anyone else, the government need to here our plead, its too much

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the price of car insurance for 17-24 year olds, but are not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like to enforce a limit on the cost of vehicle insurance for young and new drivers, you may want to sign this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223391

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
